siteMetadata.name: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.title: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.description: PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the University of Glasgow.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a second-year PhD student in Computing Science at the University of Glasgow, under the supervision of Jonathan Grizou and Mireilla Bikanga Ada. My research focuses on educational robotics.
            
Apart from research, I like writing blogs, watching and playing football and exploring the beautiful places of Scotland. I also have a beginner's level interest in the philosophy of science.
siteMetadata.author: talhayranci

markdownRemark.excerpt: The aim of the project is to control and record the warehouses, purchases and sales of small and mediumsized enterprises. In this way, profit loss controls andâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: The aim of the project is to control and record the warehouses, purchases and sales of small and mediumsized enterprises. In this way, profit loss controls and inventory controls can be done dynamically. It is also compatible with mobile use. Technologies such as PHP, Javascript and HTML were used in the project which works as a web application. MySQL was used as database.

frontmatter.title: Sale Control System for Small Businesses
frontmatter.description: My first web based project using php.
